trans-unit.source: Use Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an Azure Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: Use Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an Azure Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see <linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see <linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see <linkText>Redis Cache template</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see <linkText>Redis Cache template</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In this template, you will deploy an Azure Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: In this template, you will deploy an Azure Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:
trans-unit.target: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:

trans-unit.source: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.
trans-unit.target: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.

trans-unit.source: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.

trans-unit.source: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the environment you are deploying to.
trans-unit.target: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the environment you are deploying to.

trans-unit.source: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.
trans-unit.target: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.

trans-unit.source: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deploy.
trans-unit.target: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deploy.

trans-unit.source: We will describe each parameter in the template.
trans-unit.target: We will describe each parameter in the template.

trans-unit.source: The location of the Redics Cache.
trans-unit.target: The location of the Redics Cache.

trans-unit.source: For best perfomance, use the same location as the app to be used with the cache.
trans-unit.target: For best perfomance, use the same location as the app to be used with the cache.
